addInstanceScreen.provideMailAddressMessage:: Please provide the address you use to access Confluence.
addInstanceScreen.aggreementMessage: With continue, you agree to our

errorMessages.cannontConnectYasoonDescription: We couldn't connect to our backend server at *.yasoon.com. This might be caused by a restrictive firewall. You can just continue to use the addin but some features may not work as expected. If you want to have the full functionality, please make sure add (or ask your IT to add) yasoon.com to the whitelist
errorMessages.notifyForServerVersionDescription: We currently only support Confluence Cloud instances. Get a notification when the app is available for Confluence Server
errorMessages.invalidCredentialsDescription: Please check your credentials and try again. If this issue persists contact your Confluence Admin and make sure Basic Auth is enabled.
errorMessages.invalidUserDescription: You can't use the app as an anonymous user.
errorMessages.errorDuringLoginDescription: Please check your credentials and try again. If this issue persists contact your Confluence Admin and make sure Basic Auth is enabled.

createMeetingNotes.heading: Create meeting page
createMeetingNotes.pageNameAlreadyExistsError: There is already a page with this name.
createMeetingNotes.deleteMeetingNotesTootlip: Click to delete the meeting notes page.
createMeetingNotes.deleteMeetingNotesDraftTootlip: The meeting page will be created when you send the meeting request. Click to delete the draft.

initalPageSelection.heading: Select the meeting notes location
initalPageSelection.description: You are just a little step away from creating your first Confluence Meeting notes directly from your Outlook. First, please select the location where you want to create your meeting notes. Note: You can then change this location afterwards.

meetingAgenda.heading: Agenda
meetingAgenda.editToAdjustEndtime: Edit the meeting to adjust the end time

noConfluencePage.heading: No meeting notes page found
noConfluencePage.description: Could not find a related Confluence page. If you are the organizer you can add an agenda when editing the event.

welcomeScreen.heading: Welcome to Outlook Meetings for Confluence
welcomeScreen.createConfluencePage: Create a Confluence page for your meeting request.
welcomeScreen.planMeetingAgenda: Plan a meeting agenda direktly in Outlook: Add agenda items, durations and speakers
welcomeScreen.collaborativelyAddAndChangeAgenda: Collaboratively add and change talking points with your team in Outlook

editor.collapsedPlaceholder: Click to edit the page description

instanceSettings.currentlyNotLoggedIn: You are currently not logged in.

errorBoundary.heading: Something went wrong :/
errorBoundary.persistMessage: If this error persists please open a support ticket.
